main event: A group of seven individuals reported seeing a large orange-yellow and black flying saucer over Hearne, Texas, on September 29, 1952.
interesting points: The object was reported to have made a large semi-circular sweep from south to north., The object exited to the southwest at a terrific rate of speed., The altitude of the object was estimated to be around 20,000 feet., The report was garbled due to a poor phone connection., The credibility of the witnesses could not be established as none were found in the area.
witness description: group of seven individuals including a Dr.
